Desc.entry: An online learning prospectus for Sheffield, designed to provide students aged 14-19 years with details of the courses and qualifications available to study in the Sheffield area. The website is run by Sheffield Futures and helps prospective students find out what courses are available and where. As well as the entry requirements for each course and the opportunity to directly apply for courses online.

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
